steps.name: I login into SLZ as a "Student"
I should collect the usage detail info
I login into SLZ as a "Teacher"
I should click on "breaking bad 6" in roster tree
I should click on "Lui Class" in roster tree
I should click on student "Snow Jon" in roster tree
I should compare usage detail info of student with teacher
